attributes.title: Experiencing All Dimensions of Living Enlightenment
attributes.description: In this introductionary discourse delivered at the Life Bliss Engineering program in Bidadi, Swamiji talks about various dimensions of living enlightenment.  In each of the programs connisized by Swamiji, one dimension of Jivan Mukthi experience is delivered.  In LBE and IA programs, Swamiji works towards delivering all dimensions of Living Enlightenment.  Discourses delivered by Swamiji on a wide variety of topics in life solutions, sacred scriptures and breakthrough topics may be ordered on line in CD, DVD, iPOD formats at www.lifeblissgalleria.com
